ingredients: 1 teaspoon butter, 2  eggs, 2 slices multigrain bread, 1  ripe avocado, pitted, peeled, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste, 1 pinch cayenne pepper,   sea salt to taste,   ground black pepper to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 23g 29%, Saturated Fat 5g 26%, Cholesterol 191mg 64%, Sodium 361mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 21g 8%, Dietary Fiber 9g 31%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 12g, Vitamin C 12mg 58%, Calcium 69mg 5%, Iron 4mg 23%, Potassium 628mg 13%
